name: Broccoli Salad with Red Grapes, Bacon, and Sunflower Seeds
author: Coastal Roots
summary: Try a flavor from the beaches of the eastern shore. This refreshing yet hearty family recipe has been adopted into the families of all of our friends. We never steam a bushel of crabs without having a huge bowl of this salad and corn on the cob on the table. This dish is simply mandatory at every BBQ, potluck or pitch-in event. Give it a try!
ingredients: 1 large head broccoli, cut into bite-size pieces
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Drain bacon slices on paper towels
Crumble 7 slices of bacon; mix with sunflower seeds in a resealable bag
Combine broccoli, onion, and grapes in a bowl
Whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar, and black pepper together in a bowl; fold in the 1 slice crumbled bacon
Pour dressing over broccoli mixture; toss to coat evenly
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for flavors to blend, about 2 hours
Sprinkle bacon-sunflower seed mixture over salad before serving; mix well
